title: Between the Scenes - Michael Jackson Can Sing in Any Language He Wants
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Michael Jackson Can Sing in Any Language He Wants
description:
Trevor tells a story about how he was once convinced that Michael Jackson's hit "Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough" featured a verse in a South African language.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
